description:
TO CLOSE THIS APP HOLD DOWN THE SHIFT (Up Arrow) AND PRESS "L".

UPDATED with touch support, build a tower and throw it down!

A fun and simple app designed to help you waste time with your children. With realistic physics and accelerometer support, this will keep a bored child from screaming or throwing a tantrum. UPDATED to with support to grab and throw the blocks with a touch. Give it to them and let them play! The menus are hidden and if the app is minimized it will automatically maximize (to prevent your child from calling someone).

It fun for children of all ages.

Please note: we are not responsible for what your child actually does with the phone. You'll want to keep an eye of them to make sure they haven't thrown it in a toliet or call someone despite the security on this app.
